biotools.summary: NCBI Datasets is a new resource that lets you easily gather data from across NCBI databases. Find and download sequence, annotation, and metadata for genes and genomes using our command-line tools or web interface.

galaxy.summary: NCBI datasets downloads biological sequence data across all domains of life from NCBI.
